com.indeed.status.core

Class AbstractDependencyManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.indeed.status.core.AbstractDependencyManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StatusUpdateListener, StatusUpdateProducer

    public abstract class AbstractDependencyManager
extends Object
implements StatusUpdateProducer, StatusUpdateListener
    The AbstractDependencyManager is a singleton clearinghouse responsible for knowing all dependencies of the system and their current availability.
